valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Fri 26 Sep 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Sat 27 Sep 2025

FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In south, mainly south or southwest 3 or 4, occasionally 5 in southwest, becoming cyclonic 6 or 7, perhaps gale 8 later . In north, southerly or southeasterly becoming cyclonic, 3 to 5.
Sea state
In south, slight or moderate, becoming very rough or high in southwest. in north, slight or moderate, becoming moderate or rough.
Weather
In south, thundery rain later. In north, occasional rain.
Visibility
In south, good, occasionally poor later. In north, good, occasionally moderate.
